trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i en visuelle utformeren for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoder kan kalles ved utformingen verten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoden kan være kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoder kan kalles ved utformingen verten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoden kan være kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText*> property.
Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Starter datakilde konfigurasjonsverktøyet i utformingen verten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString*> property.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName*> property.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName*> property.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter*> property.
Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en datakildevisning med det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to return.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på visningen til å returnere.

trans-unit.source: A object with the name specified by viewName.
trans-unit.target: En objekt med navnet som er angitt av viewName .

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over tilgjengelige visninger.

trans-unit.source: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
trans-unit.target: En samling med ett element som inneholder navnet "DefaultView".

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer kontrollen designer og laster inn den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> object to initialize.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objekt for å starte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*> property.
Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av designer for å legge til egenskaper eller Fjern egenskaper i rutenettet egenskaper, eller til skyggen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The properties to be filtered.
Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer skjemaet fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du vil skjule alle datakildehendelser før skjemaet er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select*> property.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where*> property.
